DOC.brief_summary: Despite existence effective screen test ( pap smear ) , cervical cancer , every year France , cause 3,000 new case 1,100 death . But , France , 4 10 woman screen often enough ( nearly 7 million woman ) . It therefore necessary develop new strategy reach woman . The etiological factor cancer persistent infection High-Risk Human PapillomaVirus oncogene ( HR-HPV ) . Thereby , HPV-based test could alternative screen test . Vaginal self-sampling HR-HPV test simpler less intrusive pap smear . It show vaginal self-sampling HPV test powerful mean increase participation rate cervical cancer screening .
